channel.title: Comments on: 2016 – 2017 Year In Review: IB Mathematics SL
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Evan Weinberg
item.dc:creator: Evan Weinberg
item.content:encoded:
In reply to beyondthestandardmodel.

This sort of thing:

“Mathematics is an important field that has applications in the real world. It is important that one has the opportunity to see how theoretical mathematics applies in the context I presented here. I think, all things considered, that what I have written here stands to emphasize this point.”

item.title: By: beyondthestandardmodel

item.description: What would be an example of a filler paragraph in the students' mathematical writing?
